content.p: We will share regular updates on the Castle Meadow site with our university community across a number of channels – including email, web, social media and the MyNottingham app as appropriate. Links to those communications will be archived where possible on this page, listed in date order. Staff are shaping the future of our new Castle Meadow campus Staff 28/02/22 UoN set to invest in city centre campus 15/09/21 Castle Meadow campus – accelerating our ambitions, lowering our costs 22/11/21
